Title: Repeals certain provisions of the vehicle and traffic law relating to the operation of bicycles with electric assist
Summary: Repeals certain provisions relating to the operation of bicycles with electric assist.
LawCode: Rpld ยง1242 sub 8, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal subdivision 8 of section 1242 of the vehicle and traffic law relating to the operation of bicycles with electric assist
